snippet: Should home health aides receive minimum wage and overtime pay protections?
abstract: Should home health aides receive minimum wage and overtime pay protections?
lead_paragraph: Home care workers provide a crucial bulwark between older adults and assisted living or nursing homes. They help seniors bathe and dress, make their meals and do their laundry, take them shopping or escort them to appointments, and do a host of other chores that allow them to live at home for as long as possible.

headline.main: Fair Pay for Home Health Aides
